RoomComponent.m_description: Colorful sandstone walls rear from the rocky sand. Runnels of sap drip from high branches, forming slow streamers to the ground below.  You hear cackling long before the tall circle of ancient stones comes into view.  Within the circle, figures work furiously around a blazing spellfire.  Do you dare to disturb a witches circle?  Nearby, the canyon opens into a dry wash.
